name: Surveillance compl√®te des certificats SSL avec alertes Discord et int√©gration Notion
description:
![Screenshot 20250704 at 18.13.54.png](fileId:1678)
## üîê Moniteur de sant√© SSL avanc√©
### üë§ Pour qui est-ce ?
#### Ce flux de travail est con√ßu pour **les ing√©nieurs DevOps, les administrateurs IT et les professionnels de la s√©curit√©** qui ont besoin d'une surveillance compl√®te des **certificats SSL et d'une √©valuation de la sant√©** sur plusieurs domaines ‚Äî avec **v√©rification double** et **rapports professionnels** sans d√©pendre de services de surveillance co√ªteux.

---

### üß© Ce que cela fait
1. **D√©clencheur quotidien** ex√©cute le flux de travail chaque matin pour une surveillance proactive.
2. **Collecte d'URL** r√©cup√®re la liste des URL de sites Web √† surveiller √† partir de votre source de donn√©es.
3. **Analyse SSL double** :
   - **Script d'√©valuation SSL gratuit** ‚Äî Obtenez-le sur [sysadmin-toolkit](https://github.com/Bubobot-Team/sysadmin-toolkit/) sur Github 
   - **API SSL-Checker.io** ‚Äî V√©rification externe pour validation crois√©e
4. **V√©rification de sant√© compl√®te** :
   - Surveillance de l'expiration des certificats (seuil personnalisable)
   - √âvaluation de la s√©curit√© de la configuration SSL
   - Analyse du support des protocoles (TLS 1.3, 1.2, protocoles obsol√®tes)
   - √âvaluation de la force des suites de chiffrement
   - Analyse des vuln√©rabilit√©s (POODLE, BEAST, etc.)
   - V√©rification de conformit√© (PCI DSS, NIST, FIPS)
5. **Syst√®me d'alerte intelligent** envoie des notifications Discord lorsque :
   - Les certificats expirent dans le seuil (par d√©faut : 30 jours)
   - Des probl√®mes de configuration SSL sont d√©tect√©s (chiffres faibles, protocoles obsol√®tes)
   - Des vuln√©rabilit√©s de s√©curit√© sont trouv√©es
   - Les normes de conformit√© ne sont pas respect√©es
   - La note tombe en dessous d'un niveau acceptable (configurable)

---

### üéØ Caract√©ristiques cl√©s
- **üîÑ V√©rification double** : V√©rifie les r√©sultats entre le scanner interne et l'API externe
- **üìä Notation de style SSL Labs** : Syst√®me de notation de A+ √† F avec analyse d√©taill√©e
- **üõ°Ô∏è √âvaluation de la s√©curit√©** : D√©tection des vuln√©rabilit√©s et v√©rification de conformit√©
- **üì± Int√©gration Discord** : Notifications enrichies avec alertes cod√©es par couleur
---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Instructions de configuration
1. **Source de donn√©es** :  
   - Configurez votre source d'URL depuis Notion
   - Assurez-vous qu'elle contient une colonne `URL` avec les domaines √† surveiller
2. **Identifiants** :  
   - Configurez le **webhook Discord** pour les notifications d'alerte
   - Configurez tous les **identifiants API** requis pour les sources de donn√©es
3. **Personnaliser les seuils** :  
   - **Alerte d'expiration** : Jours avant l'expiration (par d√©faut : 30 jours)
   - **Seuil de note** : Note SSL minimale acceptable (par d√©faut : B)
   - **Gravit√© de l'alerte** : Choisissez quels probl√®mes d√©clenchent des notifications
4. **Configuration avanc√©e** :
   - Modifiez les **v√©rifications de vuln√©rabilit√©** en fonction de vos exigences de s√©curit√©
   - Ajustez les **normes de conformit√©** pour les besoins de votre secteur
   - Personnalisez le **formatage des messages Discord** et les canaux d'alerte

---

### üß† Notes techniques
- **Fiabilit√© de la v√©rification double** : Combine le scanner Bubobot personnalis√© avec ssl-checker.io pour une pr√©cision maximale
- **Pas de verrouillage fournisseur** : Utilise des API publiques gratuites et des outils open-source
- **Rapports professionnels** : G√©n√®re des √©valuations de qualit√© SSL Labs
- **Approche ax√©e sur la s√©curit√©** : V√©rification compl√®te des vuln√©rabilit√©s et de la conformit√©
- **Alertes flexibles** : Int√©gration Discord avec formatage riche et logique conditionnelle


Ce flux de travail fournit une **solution compl√®te de surveillance de la s√©curit√© SSL** qui rivalise avec des outils de niveau entreprise tout en restant compl√®tement open-source et gratuit.

parameters.content:
## üîê Advanced SSL Health Monitor
### üë§ Who is this for?
#### This workflow is designed for **DevOps engineers, IT administrators, and security professionals** who need comprehensive **SSL certificate monitoring and health assessment** across multiple domains ‚Äî featuring **dual verification** and **professional reporting** without relying on expensive monitoring services.

---

### üß© What It Does
1. **Daily Trigger** runs the workflow every morning for proactive monitoring.
2. **URL Collection** fetches the list of website URLs to monitor from your data source.
3. **Dual SSL Analysis**:
   - **Bubobot SSL Scanner** ‚Äî Our custom SSL health assessment tool (SSL Labs-style analysis)
   - **SSL-Checker.io API** ‚Äî External verification for cross-validation
4. **Comprehensive Health Check**:
   - Certificate expiration monitoring (customizable threshold)
   - SSL configuration security assessment
   - Protocol support analysis (TLS 1.3, 1.2, deprecated protocols)
   - Cipher suite strength evaluation
   - Vulnerability scanning (POODLE, BEAST, etc.)
   - Compliance checking (PCI DSS, NIST, FIPS)
5. **Smart Alert System** sends Discord notifications when:
   - Certificates expire within threshold (default: 30 days)
   - SSL configuration issues detected (weak ciphers, deprecated protocols)
   - Security vulnerabilities found
   - Compliance standards not met
   - Grade drops below acceptable level (configurable)

---

### üéØ Key Features
- **üîÑ Dual Verification**: Cross-checks results between internal scanner and external API
- **üìä SSL Labs-Style Grading**: A+ to F rating system with detailed analysis
- **üõ°Ô∏è Security Assessment**: Vulnerability detection and compliance checking
- **üì± Discord Integration**: Rich embed notifications with color-coded alerts
- **üìà Historical Tracking**: Maintain SSL health trends over time
- **üö® Smart Alerting**: Only alerts on actual issues, reducing noise
- **üìÑ Professional Reports**: HTML reports for stakeholder sharing

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions
1. **Data Source**:  
   - Configure your URL source from Notion
   - Ensure it contains a `URL` column with domains to monitor
2. **Credentials**:  
   - Set up **Discord webhook** for alert notifications
   - Configure any required **API credentials** for data sources
3. **Customize Thresholds**:  
   - **Expiration Alert**: Days before expiry (default: 30 days)
   - **Grade Threshold**: Minimum acceptable SSL grade (default: B)
   - **Alert Severity**: Choose which issues trigger notifications
4. **Advanced Configuration**:
   - Modify **vulnerability checks** based on your security requirements
   - Adjust **compliance standards** for your industry needs
   - Customize **Discord message formatting** and alert channels

---

### üß† Technical Notes
- **Dual-Check Reliability**: Combines custom Bubobot scanner with ssl-checker.io for maximum accuracy
- **No Vendor Lock-in**: Uses free public APIs and open-source tools
- **Scalable Architecture**: Easily handles monitoring of hundreds of domains
- **Professional Reporting**: Generates SSL Labs-quality assessments
- **Security-First Approach**: Comprehensive vulnerability and compliance checking
- **Flexible Alerting**: Discord integration with rich formatting and conditional logic


This workflow transforms basic SSL expiry checking into a **comprehensive SSL security monitoring solution** that rivals enterprise-grade tools while remaining completely open-source and cost-effective.

### üïí Daily Trigger
Runs the workflow every day at 10:00 AM.  
Adjust the time or frequency as needed using cron or interval settings.

### üìÑ Fetch URLs
Reads website URLs from Notion.  
Make sure the sheet has a column named `URL` containing the domains you want to monitor.

### üîç Check SSL
Queries `ssl-checker.io` (free API) for SSL certificate data of each domain.  
Returns valid_from, valid_till, days_left, and host info.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Expiry Alert
Checks if `days_left` is less than or equal to 7.  
Only domains that meet this condition will trigger an email alert.

### üìß Send Discord alerts
Sends alerts whether there are problems

### üîç Check SSL health score
Use sysadmin-toolkit/scripts/ssl/ssl-health-assessment.js
  
Returns SSL overall grade, vulnerabilities and actions to take

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
